name: Napolitana
description: Neapolitan-style; a thin round crust topped with a fresh pomodoro(tomato) sauce, mozzarella, oregano, & stone deck oven baked.

name: Bianca
description: Neapolitan-style; a thin round crust topped with garlic butter, ricotta, mozzarella, & stone deck oven baked.

name: Siciliana
description: Sicilian-style; a thick rectangular deep dish crust topped with a fresh pomodoro(tomato) sauce, mozzarella, oregano, & stone deck oven baked.

name: Napolitana Slice
description: Single slice of a 20 inch Neapolitan-style; a thin round crust topped with a fresh pomodoro(tomato) sauce, mozzarella, oregano, & stone deck oven baked.

name: Bianca Slice
description: Single slice of a 20 inch Neapolitan-style; a thin round crust topped with garlic butter, ricotta, mozzarella, & stone deck oven baked.

name: Siciliana Slice
description: Single slice of a 20 inch Sicilian-style; a thick rectangular deep dish crust topped with a fresh pomodoro(tomato) sauce, mozzarella, oregano, & stone deck oven baked.

name: Grandma Pie
description: Long Island-style; a rustic rectangular pan pizza crust, topped with mozzarella fresca, mozzarella, garlic, & stone deck oven baked. Finished with a fresh pomodoro(tomato) sauce, basil puree, & parmesan.

name: Margherita Buono
description: Neapolitan-style; a thin, round crust, topped with mozzarella fresca, olive oil, & stone deck oven baked. Finished with a fresh pomodoro(tomato) sauce, & basil puree.

name: Meat Lover
description: Neapolitan-style; a thin round crust topped with a fresh pomodoro(tomato) sauce, pepperoni, sausage, meatballs, bacon, mozzarella, oregano, & stone deck oven baked.

name: Vegetarian
description: Neapolitan-style; a thin round crust topped with a fresh pomodoro(tomato) sauce, mushrooms, green bell peppers, onions, mozzarella, oregano, & stone deck oven baked.

name: Works
description: Neapolitan-style; a thin round crust topped with a fresh pomodoro(tomato) sauce, pepperoni, sausage, mushrooms, green bell peppers, onions, mozzarella, oregano, & stone deck oven baked.

name: Baked Ziti
description: Neapolitan-style; a thin round crust topped with a fresh pomodoro(tomato) sauce, ricotta, ziti pasta, mozzarella, oregano, & stone deck oven baked.

name: Gluten Free
description: Gluten free-style; a thin, round 12 inch pizza crust that is a combination of gluten free flours & starches like rice flour, almond flour, potato starch, & tapioca starch.

name: Cauliflower
description: Cauliflower-style; a thin, round 10 inch pizza crust that is a gluten-free, low-carb & keto pizza recipe. It's a simple blend of cauliflower, eggs, cheese, & a few spices that's flattened & baked into a golden crust.

name: Calzone
description: Neapolitan-style; an Italian turnover made with leavened dough & folded. Stuffed with mozzarella, ricotta, & stone deck oven baked.

name: Salami, Capocollo, Soppressata, & Provolone
description: An Italian turnover made with leavened dough & rolled. Stuffed with salami, capocollo, soppressata, provolone. & stone deck oven baked.

name: Sausage, Onion, & Pepper
description: An Italian turnover made with leavened dough & rolled. Stuffed with sausage, onions, green bell peppers, mozzarella, & stone deck oven baked.

name: Meatball & Mozzarella
description: An Italian turnover made with leavened dough & rolled. Stuffed with meatballs, marinara, mozzarella, & stone deck oven baked.

name: Eggplant & Mozzarella
description: An Italian turnover made with leavened dough & rolled. Stuffed with breaded eggplant cutlets, marinara, mozzarella, & stone deck oven baked.

name: Chicken & Mozzarella
description: An Italian turnover made with leavened dough & rolled. Stuffed with breaded chicken cutlets, marinara, mozzarella, & stone deck oven baked.

name: Meatballs, Sausage, Pepperoni, & Mozzarella
description: An Italian turnover made with leavened dough & rolled. Stuffed with meatballs, sausage, pepperoni, marinara, mozzarella, & stone deck oven baked.

name: Sausage Roll
description: NYC-style; a blend of sausage, onions, green bell peppers, & mozzarella. Rolled in a light pizza dough. Brushed with garlic herb butter & stone deck oven baked.

name: Garlic Bread
description: An Italian baguette brushed with garlic herb butter & lightly toasted.

name: Sicilian Garlic Bread
description: An Italian baguette brushed with garlic herb butter, topped with mozzarella, & lightly toasted.

name: Meatballs & Ricotta
description: Twin jumbo meatballs accompanied by marinara sauce, ricotta & parmesan.

name: Meatball Sliders
description: Five crostini's topped with our meatballs, marinara sauce, oregenao, & mozzarella.

name: Fries
description: Tossed with salt, black pepper, garlic seasoning, oregano, & parsley.

name: Pepperoni Pizza Fries
description: Bounos-style; seasoned french fries baked with pepperoni, mozzarella, oregano, & finished with marinara sauce.

name: NJ Style Disco Fries
description: New Jersey diner-style; seasoned french fries baked with mozzarella, topped with a classic brown chicken gravy, & parsley.

name: Fried Mushrooms
description: Cremini mushrooms, coated in a light & crispy seasoned batter, then deep fried to golden brown perfection. Served with buttermilk ranch.

description: Fresh zucchini sticks, Italian bread crumb dredged, then deep fried to golden brown perfection. Served with buttermilk ranch.

name: Traditional Chicken Wings
description: Bone-in fried chicken wings tossed in your choice of sauce. Served with celery sticks, & choice of dressing.

description: Boneless fried chicken pieces tossed in your choice of sauce. Served with celery sticks, & choice of dressing.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Romaine lettuce, Italian style croutons, caesar dressing, & parmesan.

description: Romaine lettuce, tomatoes, onions, black olives, oregano, parmesan, & choice of dressing.

name: Caprese
description: Mozzarella fresca, vine-ripened tomatoes, olive oil, balsamic fig glaze, basil puree, salt, & pepper.

name: Chicken Parmesan
description: Breaded chicken cutlets covered with marinara sauce & mozzarella. Served with a side of pasta, small house salad, & small Italian baguette.

name: Eggplant Parmesan
description: Breaded eggplant cutlets covered with marinara sauce & mozzarella. Served with a side of pasta, small house salad, & small Italian baguette.

name: Lasagna Bolognese
description: A baked six layer Neapolitan style lasagna stacked with bechamel, ground beef, marinara, ricotta, mozzarella, & parmesan. Served with a small house salad, & small Italian baguette.

name: Ravioli Grande
description: Six jumbo ricotta stuffed ravioli topped with marinara sauce, parmesan, & Italian herbs. Served with a side of pasta, small house salad, & small Italian baguette.

description: Foot long Italian baguette layered with deli ham, provolone, lettuce, tomatoes & onions. Choice of house dressing, mayonnaise, &/or mustard.

description: Foot long Italian baguette layered with salami, provolone, lettuce, tomatoes & onions. Choice of house dressing, mayonnaise, &/or mustard.

description: An Italian baguette brushed with garlic herb butter & lightly toasted.

name: Fries
description: Tossed with salt, black pepper, garlic seasoning, oregano, & parsley.

name: Italian Ice
description: Refreshing icy textured treat that is dairy-free, gluten-free, cholesterol-free, and fat-free.

name: Black & White Cookie
description: Queens NYC-style; a round cookies frosted in two colors, with one half vanilla & the other chocolate.

name: Crumb Cake
description: Queens NYC-style; a cake made of yeast dough covered with a sweet crumb topping referred to as streusel.

name: Cannoli Grande
description: Sicilian-style; a tube-shaped shell of fried pastry dough, filled with a sweet, creamy filling containing ricotta, mini chocolate chips, & topped with crushed pistachios.

name: Tiramisu
description: A coffee-flavoured Italian dessert made of ladyfingers (savoiardi) dipped in coffee, layered with a whipped mascarpone, & flavoured with cocoa.

name: Cheese Cake
description: NYC-style; a dense and rich cheese cake baked in a graham cracker crust with sweet cream cheese vanilla filling.

name: Limoncello Cake
description: Fluffy sponge cake layers, brushed with a limoncello syrup, filled with a thin layer of lemon curd and frosted with a decadent mascarpone and cream cheese frosting.

name: Chocolate Mousse Cake
description: Rich layers of dark, milk and white chocolate come together perfectly in this no-bake cake. A chocolate cookie-crumb crust adds a satisfying crunch to the silky, smooth mousse.

name: Zeppolis
description: Italian-style; deep-fried dough fritters & topped with powdered sugar.
